trans-unit.source: Represents the direction in which to display controls that include text in a container control.
trans-unit.target: 表示在容器 (Container) 控制項中顯示包含文字之控制項的方向。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentDirection> enumeration represents the direction in which to display controls that include text in a container control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentDirection>列舉，代表要在其中顯示包含的文字容器控制項中的控制項的方向。

trans-unit.source: Controls, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, have properties that use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentDirection> enumeration values to specify the direction in which to display child controls that include text.
trans-unit.target: 控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，其屬性可使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentDirection>以指定要在其中顯示子控制項的方向的列舉值包含的文字。

trans-unit.source: If you specify the LeftToRight value, child controls that include text display text from left to right and justify the text on the left side of the container control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定 LeftToRight 值，包含文字的子控制項就會顯示從左到右和對齊左邊的容器控制項上文字的文字。

trans-unit.source: If you specify the RightToLeft value, child controls that include text display text from right to left and justify the text on the right side of the container control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定從右至左值，包含文字的子控制項就會顯示由右至左的文字，並讓容器控制項右側文字對齊。

trans-unit.source: Use the RightToLeft value to display text for languages that are written from right to left, such as Arabic and Hebrew.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示其文字由右至左，如阿拉伯文與希伯來文書寫的語言使用從右至左值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentDirection.LeftToRight> enumeration to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.Direction%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentDirection.LeftToRight>列舉來設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.Direction%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> control is populated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentDirection> enumeration values.
The display direction of the label and radio buttons in the panel change based on the value that the user selects from the list box.
trans-unit.target: 標籤和選項按鈕，在使用者從清單方塊中選取的值為基礎的面板變更顯示方向。

trans-unit.source: Because this example uses English text, when the RightToLeft value is selected, the text is justified on the right side of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.Direction%2A> control, but the left-to-right order of the English text is maintained.
trans-unit.target: 由於這個範例會使用英文，選取從右至左值時，對齊文字的右邊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.Direction%2A>維護控制，但左到右的順序英文文字。

trans-unit.source: In a real-world application, you would not set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.Direction%2A> property to the RightToLeft value, if you were displaying text for a language that uses left-to-right order.
trans-unit.target: 在真實世界應用程式中，您就不應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.Direction%2A>屬性設為從右至左值，如果您已顯示文字的語言使用左到右的順序。
